docs.snippet: On Sunday, an annual charity match on Long Island between New York City’s Police and Fire Departments was interrupted by a 20-minute melee....
docs.lead_paragraph: On Sunday, an annual charity match on Long Island between New York City’s Police and Fire Departments was interrupted by a 20-minute melee.
docs.abstract: Tension between New York City Fire Department and Police Department erupts in public, leaving an old rivalry newly exposed; latest episode takes place on Long Island, during an annual charity hockey match between the Bravest and the Finest that turned into a melee on ice; neither department would comment about the fight or say whether any of the players would be disciplined.

headline.main: Hockey Brawl Is Old Story of Policemen vs. Firemen
headline.print_headline: Hockey Brawl Is Old Story of Policemen vs. Firemen

docs.snippet: The Pirates had a four-run lead in the first inning and were up two runs after five....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pirates had a four-run lead in the first inning and were up two runs after five.

headline.main: Pirates Beat Castro (2 HRs) and Cubs 7-6
headline.print_headline: Pirates Beat Castro (2 HRs) and Cubs 7-6

docs.snippet: As the NFL readies for its annual draft of college football players, new film "Draft Day" pulls back the curtain on the high stakes of the offseason that has helped turn the United States' most popular sport into a year-round addiction....
docs.lead_paragraph: As the NFL readies for its annual draft of college football players, new film "Draft Day" pulls back the curtain on the high stakes of the offseason that has helped turn the United States' most popular sport into a year-round addiction.

headline.main: 'Draft Day' Film Tackles the NFL With Insider Minutiae, Family Drama
headline.print_headline: 'Draft Day' Film Tackles the NFL With Insider Minutiae, Family Drama

docs.snippet: Lance Lynn dug another early hole. The St. Louis Cardinals offense climbed right out of it....

docs.snippet: Ukrainian serviceman Ivan Marchenko's wife is filing for divorce over his decision to follow orders to withdraw from Russian-controlled Crimea. He is not alone....
